table_caption: Task-specific fMRI studies of prism adaptation (PA). Meta-Analysis 1 includes five studies that scanned healthy individuals before and after PA who performed tasks different from the task they performed during PA. Meta-Analysis 2 includes three studies that scanned individuals with right brain damage (RBD) due to stroke before and after PA who performed the same or different tasks from the task they performed during PA. Meta-Analysis 3 includes four studies that scanned healthy individuals during PA.
